column2: "Alright, let's get started. First, the results of our investigation into Lost Central..."

"We've managed to ascertain
the potential whereabouts of Dark Falz."

"That location would be
deep in the heart of the Stia Region."

"Thanks to everyone's efforts, we've completed
the Central Cannon. It can be fired at a moment's notice."
"The plan is to lure Dark Falz to the surface..."

"...and when he gets within range of the cannon, fire!
Putting an end to this long battle."
"This is all much easier said than done, of course."
"The Stia Region happens to be one of Halpha's most dangerous areas."

"There are two reasons. The first being that the entire
Stia Region is covered in massive quantities of magma."

"The second being the discovery of a plurality of
new DOLLS of incomparable strength."

"It sounds easy on paper... but this will certainly
be your most dangerous and grueling mission yet."

"I ask that you all steel your resolve.
Let's make sure we win this."

"Right, understood! I've just got
one question, if you don't mind me asking..."

"Are there any ARKS in the Stia Region?
Like Nadereh's or Ilma's people?"

"I mean, every time we get sent to a new region, there's always
been fellow ARKS to coordinate efforts against the DOLLS..."

"It'd just put my mind at ease
knowing we've got allies there, that's all."

"Ah, yes... A vanguard unit has been
developing in the Stia Region, yes."

"If only we had a
means to contact them..."

"But... we do? The forward party is
set up at the Stia Camp, sir."
"I'll just go ahead and patch us through now."

"...Agh!
Wait!"
"Yoohoo! This is Operator Noroshi speaking!"

"...And so we'd like to coordinate
a strategy to take down Dark Falz."
"Yup yup! You betcha! So, what shall we do, Commander?"
"...Crawford."

"Ahhh...
It's been a while, Guren."

"Noroshi got me up to speed.
No objections here."
"...Thank you."
"...Kanui."
"You're our liaison."
"...Understood."
"This is Adjudant Kanui speaking."

"Mr. Crawford, Rossa, Oranje,
long time no see."

"Lodging will be prepared
for your arrivals."
"Take care."
"...Are you two still at odds...?"

"...No, not as much as we used to be.
It'll work out. I won't make the same mistake."

"...Well, please set off for the Stia Region
after making doubly sure that you're prepared."
"I pray for your success."
